document_name: Act on planning and construction case processing (Planning and Building Act)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/NOR/2008/NOR-2008-01-01-Act on planning and construction case processing (Planning and Building Act)_b99fae198b8088490153803aa1b626f9.pdf
document_description: This act aims to promote sustainable development in the best interests of individuals, society and future generations. All plans made under the act are to take the climate into account in energy supply and transport solutions.
